snippet: Neighbors said goodbye to the canvas covered Billy’s Antiques and Props, a 20-year mainstay, which is set to be replaced by a modern, brick building.
abstract: Neighbors near the Bowery at East Houston Street say goodbye to the canvas covered Billy’s Antiques and Props, a 20-year mainstay, which is set to be replaced by a modern, brick building.
lead_paragraph: Neighbors said goodbye to the canvas covered Billy’s Antiques and Props, a 20-year mainstay, which is set to be replaced by a modern, brick building.

headline.seo: With Funeral March, Bowery Mourns Its Tent of Antiquity
headline.main: With a Solemn March, the Bowery Mourns Its Tent of Antiquity
headline.print_headline: With Solemn March, Bowery Mourns Its Tent of Antiquity
